title: some help with a font
content:
I had this font at one point on my computer, but now I cant seem to find it and was wondering if anyone knew what it could be. I have been searching around for quite some time but have not been able to come up with it. Any help would be great.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015065633im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font%20test_3976.png)
author: the_great_oz

comments.content:
took a little extra digging. for some reason whatfontis wanted me to pay to get this id. ha!

[Serpentis Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015065633/http:/www.dafont.com/serpentis-black.font?text=Southside+Truck+and+Auto)
